He is seeking a loan to purchase feed and vitamins for his chickens so that he can continue raising them and increasing his income.

loans.use: purchase feed and vitamins for his chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 27 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, ella posee un negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su casa, la joven está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor y asi poder seguir con sus ventas para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
The young woman whose face has been pixelated is 27 years old.  She lives in a high risk area.  She lives in her own house with her life partner and their two children.

She has a business selling fruits and vegetables.  Her business is located at the market that is close to her house.

The young woman is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise wholesale.  This way she will be able to continue with her sales in order to get better earnings.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Dúo Monte Sinai Group

texts.es:
DUO MONTE SINAI
Doña Sulmy Maritza es originaria de la aldea Xetzac Municipio de Tecpan, tiene 24 años de edad, bajo su responsabilidad esta su hija, se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos con telares.
Gracias al apoyo de su esposo sigue adelante con su trabajo en telares, ya que es una gran ayuda en este trabajo porque es el medio que tienen para salir adelante, gracias a Dios ahora su negocio a crecido un poco ya que ahora ya cuenta con otro telar más.
El sueño de ella es ampliar más su negocio comprar otro telar ya que así podrá sacar más tejidos y tener más ganancias así poder mandar a su hija a la escuela para un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Duo Monte Sinai

Sulmy Maritza is originally from the village of Xetzac, in the municipality of Tecpan. She is 24 years old, with one daughter under her care. She is dedicated to making weavings with looms.

Thanks to the support of her husband she continues advancing in her loom work, which is a great help in getting ahead. Thanks to God their business is growing now a bit since they now use the other loom more. 

Her dream is to expand her business and buy another loom so she can weave more and earn more so she can send her daughter to school for a better future.

loans.use: to buy a loom in order to create weavings

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.en: Hilaria is age 48, married to a welder, and blessed with three children. She has owned and operated a retail store in their village for almost fifteen years and earns a net income of PHP 500 daily. Her net income on this business is usually spent on their daily expenses. Due to insufficient funds from this business she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 30,000 to purchase beverages, soy sauce, vinegar, breads, cooking oil, and milk to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like beverages, soy sauce, vinegar, breads, cooking oil, and milk.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 37 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. 

Gemma has borrowed and repaid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from food vending. Gemma aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Dimas Fredy

texts.es:
Dimas de 62 años de edad, pudo estudiar hasta noveno grado, solo vive con su esposa pues sus hijos han formado sus propios hogares. 

Dimas se dedica  a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de sus padres;  trabaja durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar las vacas que poseen, en la tarde Dimas se dedica a trabajar en una finca donde obtiene un ingreso adicional para el sustento del hogar.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar una vaca para incrementar la producción de leche para elaborar cuajada, crema, requesón que vende  su esposa en los alrededores de su comunidad.

Él sueña con reparar el techo de su vivienda ya que en invierno se filtra el agua.
texts.en:
Dimas is 62 years old and attended school until ninth grade.  He lives alone with his wife because his children have made their own homes.  Dimas works in agriculture, a trade that he learned from his parents.  He works in the mornings. His wife is a homemaker and also takes care of their cows.  In the afternoons, Dimas works in a farm from which he earns an additional income to provide for his household.  

He is in need of this loan to purchase one cow to increase his milk production in order to make curd, cream and cottage cheese, which his wife sells throughout the community.  He dreams of repairing the roof of their home because in the winter it leaks.

loans.use: purchase a cow to increase his milk production so that he can make curd, cream and cottage cheese.

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Jackson is a 39 year old male Ugandan who is married to Kate. They have four children and two of them attend school.

Jackson is a businessman who operates a retail shop and also sells produce since 2008. His main customers are residents of Kyanyi.

He has applied for a loan of UGX2,500,000 to buy merchandise for his shop and also carry out farming which gives him extra income.

His dream for the future is to acquire more land for agriculture and also expand his business. However, he faces the challenge of competition from people who do similar business.

loans.use: to buy daily household use items to sell.

loans.name: Jean De Dieu

texts.en:
Jean de Dieu is 30 years old. He is married with two children aged between one and six, one of whom goes to school. He has been farming for five years. With the loan, he would like to buy more fertilizers and pay for workers for maize production. The profits from the farming will be used to pay school fees for his children.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizers and pay for workers for maize production.

loans.name: Alexia

texts.en:
Alexia is a female Ugandan, aged 36 years married mother of 4 children aged 19, 16, 13, and 10.  All four children attend school.

Her major business is a bar and hotel in Mabaale trading centre, but when she is not at the shop she carries out agriculture.

She has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to buy beers and sodas for her business. Her dreams for the future are to expand her business and educate all her children.

She however faces challenges of competition and low stock turnover. She describes herself as hardworking and honest.

loans.use: to buy beers and sodas to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 35 years of age, married, and has three children attending school. Her husband is a farmer, and at the same time, her partner in managing the ready-to-wear business. Marites has her stall in the market where she sells a variety of shirts, and shoes. She has been running the business for 12 years, and she can say that her earnings are enough to sustain their daily food expenditures. 

Marites wants to have bigger earnings for the preparation of her children’s education. She considers that by having a loan of PHP 35,000, it helps her to obtain a bigger income. She will use the loan to buy more shoes and clothes to sell. She hopes to encourage more customers, to gain a bigger income as well.

loans.use: to buy more shoes and clothes to sell.

loans.name: Lourde

texts.en: This loan helps Lourde get connected to her local prepay microgrid. Lourde is a farmer and lives with her husband and her five children in the town of Les Anglais in southern Haiti. Their blue house has no reliable access to electricity and thus Lourde is forced to use costly and harmful kerosene for lighting. With all of her children still at school, she wishes they had better light for studying at night. A solar-powered microgrid is being installed in Les Anglais, giving Lourde and her family the opportunity to connect to a higher quality, lower-cost energy source. She is looking forward to being connected as it will allow her to save money. She is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to cover the upfront cost of connection to the grid, which she will repay through her payments for electricity. An electrical connection dramatically reduces the cost of lighting in towns such as Les Anglais while offering far superior light quality and more generally providing opportunities for people to dramatically improve their quality of life. To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click here.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen is 35 years old and he lives in Sevan City of the Gegharkunik region. He is just married and has no children yet. He now works at a private workshop, and his wife works at the dental clinic. Karen is a cripple as a result of an accident. One of his legs is prosthesis and it gives him a chance to walk and do anything he wants without his wife’s help. 

Karen is a very active and cheerful person, and the fact of his being a cripple doesn’t disturb him going to work, and to live fully and enjoy his life with his lovely wife. Karen now needs this loan since he must pass a medical examination of his injured foot, and also a course of treatment, which he usually has in spring and autumn periods.

loans.use: to pay for a medical examination of his injured foot and also for a course of treatment.

loans.name: Morena Isabel

texts.es: Morena de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Morena está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como: sopas, detergentes, refresco, golosinas, aceite, etc. y así obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Morena is 39 years old. She lives in her own house with her domestic partner. She has a small store located in her house. With what she earns from her sales she is able to pay for some of her household expenses. Morena is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise such as: soups, detergents, soft drinks, sweets, oil, etc., and to obtain more earnings.

loans.use: to buy soups, detergents, soft drinks, sweets, oil, etc.

loans.name: Reynaldo Enrique

texts.es: Reynaldo de 35 años  de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura, su principal siembra es el maíz,  comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono y veneno para el cultivo y así poder seguir con su trabajo para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Reynaldo is 35 years old. He has worked for many years in agriculture. His main activity is to grow corn. He sells his products at the different markets that are found near his house. He lives in his own house with his domestic partner. He is requesting a loan to buy manure and poison for his crops, and in this way be able to continue with his work and obtain better income.

loans.use: to buy manure and poison for the crops.

loans.name: Marvie Joy

texts.en:
Marvie Joy is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice farming business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies for her farming business. Marvie Joy has been in this business for three years. She also earns more income from a general store and buying and selling charcoal. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. Marvie Joy has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Guillermo Jose

texts.es:
La Fuerza y la disciplina son dos palabras que definen a Guillermo, un hombre trabajador de 32 años que día a día lucha por brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Está agradecido con el primer financiamiento de Kiva a través de MiCrédito con el que logró invertir nuevos productos en su pequeña pulpería, tales como dulces, refrescos, galletas, asimismo ropa como pantalón y camisas, tanto para hombre como para mujer. Se esmera en ofrecer atención y productos de calidad, todo con el objetivo de ganar más clientela y de esta manera seguir progresando. 
Guillermo solicita un segundo crédito para invertirlo en ropa, requiere comprar pantalones tanto para hombres como para mujeres, blusas, camisetas, gorras, zapatos de gamusa y sandalias. Estima que el préstamo le será de mucha ayuda puesto que logrará ganar más clientela, lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ganancias y así podrá cumplir uno de sus sueños, establecer un negocio más amplio y seguro. Asegura que apoyo de la familia siempre es fundamental para lograr el éxito, razón por la que se muestra agradecido y espera cumplir sus metas y nunca fallarles
texts.en:
Strength and discipline are two words that define Guillermo, 32, a hard-working man who struggles day after day to offer his family better life conditions.  He is grateful for the first Kiva loan through MiCredito with which he was able to invest in new products for his small shop, such as candies, soft drinks, cookies, as well as pants and shirts for men and women.  He takes great pains to offer attention and quality products, all with the aim of gaining more customers and in this way to continue progressing.
Guillermo is asking for a second loan to invest in clothing.  He needs to buy pants for men as well as women, blouses, T-shirts, ball caps, suede shoes, and sandals.  He reckons that the loan will be a great help to him in that he will be able to garner more customers, which will permit him to increase his profits and he will be able to fulfill one of his dreams, i.e., to establish a larger and more secure business.  He asserts that support of the family is fundamental to achieve success which is the reason that he shows gratitude and he hopes to fulfill his goals and never to fail at them.

loans.use: to buy pants for men as well as women, blouses, T-shirts, ball caps, suede shoes, and sandals.

loans.name: Roselda

texts.en: Roselda is 54 years old and married with five children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  Roselda has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell. She has been in this business for five years. In the future, Roselda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is 44 years old and has three children. Shirley is married and all of her children are in school.

Shirley is in the agricultural (poultry) business in the Philippines. Shirley requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her poultry.

Shirley has been in the poultry business for three years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future Shirley would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her poultry.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like rice, milk, sugar, etc. for her food vending business.

Dominga has been in this business for three years. Dominga earns more income from farming rice.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like rice, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 63 years old and married with three children. Teresita works very hard to provide for them.

Teresita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Teresita has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, bread and other groceries. 

In the future Teresita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Maria Estela

texts.es: Maria de 46 años de edad vive con su hija en casa propia,  ella se dedica a la confección de ropa, tiene ya más de 15 años de experiencia en el negocio, con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar las necesidades de su hogar, Maria esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de tela, hilos, agujas, botones, etc. y también una maquina collaretera  de algodón para continuar con su trabajo y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 46 years old and lives with her daughter in the house she owns.  She works making clothing.  She has more than 15 years of experience with this business.  With the money she earns from her sales, she is able to meet the household necessities.  

Maria is requesting a new loan to purchase fabric, thread, needles, buttons, and a sewing machine to make cotton collars to continue with her work and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, needles, buttons, and a sewing machine to make cotton collars.

loans.name: Koemhieng

texts.en:
Koemhieng, 44, lives in Bakan District, Pursat Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of four unmarried children and one married child. For the last 18 years, she has been in the farming business growing rice and selling the products to local dealers and the customers at the market. 

Koemhieng wants to promote her convenient life by having a latrine for her family to use.  Now she is borrowing a loan from HKL to build a hygienic latrine for the sake for her family members. She would like to thank lenders for the financial support via HKL, which provides her with a much lower interest rate than general loan products.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine.

loans.name: Sakhorn

texts.en:
Sakhorn, 43, lives in Bakan District, Pursat Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of four unmarried children. For the last thirty years, she has been in the farming business, growing rice and selling the crops to the local dealers and customers at the market. The average income that she can generate is USD 8 per day. 

Sakhorn wants to promote her convenient life by having latrine for her family to use. Now she is borrowing a loan from HKL to build a hygienic latrine for the sake for her family members. She would like to thank lenders for the financial support via HKL, which provides her with a much lower interest rate than for its general loan product.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine.

loans.name: Grupo Sector La Ceiba Group

texts.es:
De 33 años de edad ya con grandes aspiraciones en dar a conocer a su comunidad y a todos los que la visitan la actividad que el realiza con tanto esfuerzo y dedicación, casado y vive con su esposa con el deseo de superar en la vida e alcanzar grandes sueños que el quiere realizar en la vida, el tiene dos hijos el primero ya tienen familias apartes y el ultimo es un excelente estudiante en la escuela de su comunidad. (Domingo es la que se encuentra de 1ra de derecha a izquierda  de la fotografía)
	
El trabajo que el realiza con tanto esmero es la compra y venta de cortes típicas dicha actividad lo realiza en su casa y en lugares cercanos de su comunidad donde el vive, el lleva realizando dicha actividad durante 3 años, la segunda actividad que el realiza es la venta de refacciones negocio que realiza con su esposa por más de cinco años porque les genera una ganancia para el bienestar de su familia y mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia y comunidad.

El ha sido un ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de mujeres se han unido a Domingo para poder emprender sus negocios para que cada uno de ellas pueda supera y tener ingresos importantes.

El uso que el le dará al préstamo que el está realizando es para la compra de mercadería de trajes típicas para luego venderlas por los alrededores de su comunidad. Uno de las aspiraciones de el es tener un local en el mercado de su comunidad y ver que sus hijos se convierten en profesionales en la vida.
texts.en:
Domingo is 33 years old, and he has great aspirations to get to know his community and everyone who visits the business that he runs with such effort and dedication.  He is married and lives with his wife, and he wants to excel and achieve the great dreams that he has for his life.  He has 2 children, one of whom lives with a separate family.  The younger child is an excellent student in the local school.  (Domingo is found at the far right of the photograph).  

The business that Domingo runs with such care involves the purchase and sale of traditional Guatemalan skirts.  He does this work from his home and in places near the community where he lives.  He's been doing this type of work for 3 years.  In addition, he also sells snacks, a business that he's been carrying out with his wife for more than 5 years, because this generates extra earnings for the welfare of his family, and this enables him to improve the financial condition of his family and community.

Domingo has been a role model in his community, and this is why a group of women got together with Domingo to form a communal bank in order to launch businesses so that each one of them can succeed and have more income.

Domingo will use this loan to buy traditional clothing to sell in the areas surrounding his community.  One of his aspirations is to have a shop in the market in his town.  He also wants to see his children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing to sell

loans.name: Sangan

texts.en: A famer living in Takeo province, Sangan is 39 years old. She is a mother of three children, one of whom is in university and the other two are in school. She earns income to support her family via rice cropping and working for others for a fee to earn extra income. For Sangan, this is the first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her loan portion to pay school fees for her son who wants to pursue a Bachelor Degree majoring in Physics. She hopes that her son can get a good job after graduating.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her son.

loans.name: Peterson

texts.en:
Peterson is 33 years old and sells clothes. He has been in this business for 14 years and it has been profitable. He is married and together with his spouse they have been blessed with 2 children. His spouse also provides additional income to support the family.

He will use this loan to buy more clothes such as trousers and shirts for sale. He will use the anticipated profits to expand his business.

This is his 5th loan term from VisionFund Kenya and he has paid his previous loans successfully. His future hopes and dreams are to grow his business and be successful.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Nemie

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Nemie works hard to support her family. She has a business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening and buying and selling charcoal. Nemie is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase an additional stock of vegetables to sell at her business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. Nemie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional stock of vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Daniela Teresa

texts.es:
Daniela tiene 24 años, nació en La Paz - Bolivia y es la menor de tres hermanas, ella nos comenta que su mamá al no lograr tener un trabajo estable, decidió salir del país para poderlo conseguir y así enviarles una mensualidad para cubrir los gastos del hogar ya que su padre las abandono hace mucho tiempo atrás. Es así que gracias al esfuerzo de su mamá Daniela logro ingresar a la Universidad para estudiar lo que más le apasiona, que es la carrera de Ingeniería en Ecología y Medio Ambiente. 

Actualmente Daniela se encuentra en la etapa final de su carrera pero lamentablemente le es difícil continuar pagando la universidad, ya que su mamá se encuentra muy delicada de salud, por lo que tuvo que retornar al país y dejar de trabajar. 

Daniela considera que lo que la diferencia de los demás es su perseverancia para alcanzar sus metas y está convencida que al obtener su titulación, sus posibilidades de insertarse al mercado laboral serán mayores, lo que le permitirá ayudar en los gastos de su hogar. Su sueño es formar parte de una empresa que tenga como función el mejorar la flora y fauna del país. 

Daniela agradece a todas las personas que a través de sus recursos podrán ayudarla a cumplir sus sueños y generan nuevas oportunidades de crecimiento.
texts.en: Daniela is 24 years old. She was born in La Paz - Bolivia and is the youngest of three sisters. She says that, because her mother could not have a stable job, she decided to leave the country in order to find one and send them a monthly amount to pay for household expenses, because their father had abandoned them long time ago. This is why, thanks to her mother's effort, Daniela was able to enter college to study what she is passionate about, which is the career of Ecology and Environmental Engineering. Currently, Daniela is at the end phase of her career, but sadly it is difficult for her to keep paying for college, because her mother got sick and had to return to the country and stop working. Daniela considers that she is different from others because of her perseverance to reach her goals. She is convinced that after she gets her title, her chances to enter the labor market will be better and this will allow her to help with household expenses. Her dream is to form part of a company whose purpose is to improve the flora and fauna of the country. Daniela is grateful to all the people who with their resources are able to help her fulfill her dreams, and who generate new opportunities of growth.

loans.use: to pay for her career in Ecology and Environmental Engineering

loans.name: Tamara

texts.ru:
Тамаре 47 лет. Она имеет высшее образование и работает учительницей в лицее своего города Куляб. Ее стаж работы составляет 20 лет. Тамара замужем. Ее муж работает в иностранной организации. У них двое детей. Дочери 21 год, а сыну 13 лет. Дочь в настоящее время учится в Государственном Медицинском Университете на третьем курсе. А сын еще школьник. 
Тамара запрашивает кредит для оплаты годового контракта дочери. Ей не хватает всего 600 долларов США. Она надеется на поддержку кредиторов Kiva и заранее благодарит их за помощь.
texts.en:
Tamara is 47. She has a higher education and has been working as a schoolteacher in her town of Kulob for 20 years. She is married and her husband works for an international organization. They have two children, a 21-year-old daughter and a 13-year-old son. Their daughter is a third-year student at the State Medical University, and their son is still in school.

Tamara is requesting a loan to pay her daughter's tuition. The amount she requires is $600 USD. She hopes for support from Kiva lenders and thanks them in advance for their help.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's university tuition

loans.name: José Israel

texts.es:
José tiene 46 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado está casado y tiene dos hijos.

José junto a sus hijos trabaja en las parcelas que poseen  durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, durante las tardes sus hijos van a estudiar y José se queda cuidando las vacas que posee. 

	Este crédito lo necesita para comprar una novilla  que le servirá en un futuro para incrementar la producción de leche para la venta y obtener ingresos adicionales para su familia.

Sus sueños son comprar más ganado y darles buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José, age 46, went to school through the sixth grade.  He is married and has two children.  In the morning, together with his children, José works two parcels of land that they have.  His wife devotes herself to the household chores.  During the afternoons his children go to school, and José stays to take care of the cows that he has.

He needs this loan to buy a heifer to increase the milk production in the future.  The milk will be sold to get additional income for his family.

His dreams are to buy more livestock and to give his children a good education.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Myra

texts.en:
Myra is 43 years old and married with two children, both of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Myra has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Myra requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

Myra has been in this business for five years. In the future, Myra would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Tadeo

texts.en:
Tadeo is a Ugandan living in Bundibugyo. He is married with six children and three of them are in school. He works hard to have his children kept in school until they complete their studies.

His major business is cocoa buying and selling however, he also does stone quarrying as a side income.

He wants the loan to process his land title.

loans.use: to process his land title.

loans.name: Aida

texts.ru: Аиде 45 лет, замужем, есть сын - студент. У Аиды высшее образование, много лет проработала в школе учителем математики. Благодаря упорному труду Аиды, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы и 0,82 ГА собственного земельного участка, на котором Аида выращивает ячмень и картофель, также 1,0 Га арендованной земли, где посеян эспарцет. Ежемесячная прибыль Аиды составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На накопленные средства она уже начала строительство дома, но ей не хватает средств для его завершения, поэтому Аида обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 65,000 сом (KGS) на покупку линолеума, изолина,  материалов для штукатурки стен для завершения строительства ее дома. А прибыль от животноводства Аида планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и образование своего сына.
texts.en: Aida is 45 years old, married, and she has a son who is a student.  Aida herself has a college degree, and she used to work as a math teacher in a school for many years.  Thanks to her very hard work, she now owns two cows as well as 0.82 hectare of land on which she grows barley and potatoes.  She also leases another hectare of land on which she cultivates hay.  She makes a monthly income of about 15,000 som (KGS).  With her savings, she has already started to build a house, but she doesn't have enough money to finish its construction.  For this reason, she has turned to the bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" and requested a loan of 65,000 som (KGS) to buy some linoleum, isoline (a waterproof sheet placed under the roof tiling), as well as other materials to plaster her walls and finish building her house.  She will use the profits from her animal husbandry activity to further develop her business and to pay for her son's education.

loans.use: to purchase linoleum and construction materials to finish building her house.

loans.name: Silvio Antonio

texts.es:
La pasión por cuidar a los animales es lo que llevo a Silvio a estudiar veterinaria, hace cuatro años trabaja en una clínica poniendo en práctica los conocimientos adquiridos. Esta soltero y tiene 23 años de edad.
Escogió estudiar veterinaria porque su papa también es veterinario y le gusta a él lo que su papa hace, siente que se está desempeñando profesionalmente.  Silvio solicita el crédito para comprar diversos equipos que utiliza en su laboratorio. Dentro de sus planes futuros esta establecer su propio laboratorio y así seguir ayudando a más animales que necesitan de su apoyo.
texts.en:
The passion for taking care of animals is what made Silvio study veterinary medicine.  He has worked in a clinic, putting into practice his acquired knowledge, for four years.  He is single, and he is 23 years old.

He chose to study veterinary medicine because he father is also a veterinarian.  He likes what his father does, and he feels that he is performing professionally.

Silvio is requesting a loan to buy diverse equipment to use in his laboratory.  His future plan is to establish his own laboratory.  This way he will continue helping more animals that need his help.

loans.use: to buy diverse equipment to use in his laboratory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy compost, foliar sprays, and fertilizers, among other items, to care for her coffee plantings.

loans.name: Ines Germania

texts.es: Inés está casada y tiene 4 hijos de 9, 10, 12 y 16 años de edad y todos están estudiando, Ines juntamente con su esposo se dedica al jornal de trabajos en el campo como lo es la agricultura y también cría animales menores, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes para criarlos y comercializarlos y  asi obtener algo de ganancia, lo que Ines desea es que le siga yendo bien en su negocio y seguir trabajando y  comprar una casas para mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Inés is married and has four children, ages 9, 10, 12, and 16. All are in school. Inés, along with her husband, works on the farm, in agriculture, and she also raises small animals. 

She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of guinea pigs to raise and sell and thus obtain some earnings. What Inés wants is to continue doing well in her business and continue working and buy a house to improve the quality of life of her children.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Cayetano está en el  ciclo numero 1 del programa de Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Realizan la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para ver el nivel de ingreso de las integrantes y trabajar con ellas para que vayan creciendo.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cristina, Directora General del Comité, quien se dedica a la venta de prendas varias, ella es una mujer muy sacrificada que está luchando por poder sacar adelante a su familia y darles todo lo que no pudo tener. Quiere ser con su trabajo y es por ello que se está esforzando bastante.
La Sra. Cristina solicita de este crédito para la compra de más variedad de prendas para surtir su local y abastecer a su clientela.
Los niños que aparecen en la foto son hijos de las integrantes del Comité.
texts.en:
The San Cayetano group is in its first loan cycle with the Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras [Entrepreneurial Women's Committee] program, where all the members work and help each other to get ahead. They are taking part in the poverty elimination survey to learn the members' income level, so they can work together and gradually prosper.

One of the members is Cristina, the Committee's general director, who makes a living selling a variety of clothes. She is a very selfless woman who is working hard to get her family ahead and give them everything she couldn't have. She wants to achieve this through her work, and this is why she works very hard.

Cristina is requesting this loan to purchase a wider variety of clothes to restock her store and supply her customers.

The children in the photo are the children of some of the members of the Committee.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothes for retail.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicken, meat, rice, vegetables, fruit, etc.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a businesswoman from Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 50 years old, married, and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. 

Lydia is a full fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without default. Now, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. 

Lydia continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a dressmaking business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store. Teresita is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF in order to buy new supplies for her dressmaking business.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like soap, rice, candies, sugar, and other grocery items.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 47 years old and married with six children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Mercy has borrowed and paid 20 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from food vending.

Mercy aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 50-years-old and married with two children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Marlyn is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables seeds and other farm supplies.

Marlyn has been farming vegetables for six years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables seeds and other farm supplies

loans.name: Acleo

texts.en:
Acleo is a 62-year-old man, married with six children. He lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda, and his main business is cocoa buying and selling. He also gets some income from construction. All this has helped him to look after his family. He has gardens of cocoa and he is very hard working.
He wants a loan to buy materials to construct his house.

loans.use: to buy materials to construct his house.

loans.name: Eri

texts.en:
Eri, a 22-year-old man, is married with one child. He lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda.

He is a very hard working young man and sells items in a retail shop. He also has a salon and a cocoa garden where he gets extra income.

He hopes to expand his business and complete his house. He wants the loan to buy more sugar and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy more sugar and soap to sell.

loans.name: Vilma Arcadia

texts.es:
Vilma tiene 60 años de edad, estudió sexto grado, está acompañada y sus hijos ya son mayores de edad.

Vilma se levanta junto a sus hijos a las 5:30 a.m  para realizar sus actividades diarias que se centran en la agricultura y el cuido del ganado. En el transcurso de la tarde se dedican a ordeñar las vacas y vender la leche entre sus vecinos. 

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar una yunta de bueyes que necesita para arar la tierra.

Vilma planea que con los ingresos que obtiene de venta de la leche  y  de la siembra podrá comprar un vehículo para transportarse.
texts.en:
Vilma is 60 years old. She went to school through sixth grade. She has a partner, and her children are already adults.

Vilma gets up with her children at 5:30 am to do the daily activities that are centered on agriculture and the care of livestock. In the course of the afternoon, she milks the cows and sells the milk to her neighbors.

She needs the loan to buy a team of oxen that she needs to plow the land.

Vilma plans that with the income that she obtains from the sale of milk and from the planting, she will be able to buy a vehicle for transportation.

loans.use: to buy a team of oxen that she needs to plow the land.

loans.name: Farida

texts.en:
Farida is a kind and hardworking woman. She is a very responsible woman. Farida is divorced and is raising her daughter. She works in a school. She teaches literature. Farida has great experience in teaching. She works hard to earn a living. She is only feed keeper of her family. 

Farida’s daughter is a student in the second course at the Medical University of Tajikistan. Her daughter studies well, and she dreams to be a good doctor in the future. She is asking for a loan of 1,100 USD to pay for her daughter’s university tuition. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for her daughter

loans.name: Edison

texts.en:
Edison, a resident of Bundibugyo, Uganda, is a businessman dealing in cocoa buying and selling. He is a hardworking man and strives hard to look after his family. He has hopes of educating his children.

He is affected by inadequate capital for the business. 

He wants the loan to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell

loans.name: Silvia Veronica

texts.es: Veronica vive en el campo donde la fuente de ingresos es la crianza de animales y la agricultura, Veronica está casada y tiene 4 hijos de 4, 8,  9 y 12 años de edad que asisten a la escuela, el esposo de Veronica  trabaja de chofer, ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de chanchos, en ocasiones les cría y les vende y otras veces sale a los mercados y compra chanchitos para venderlos en ese mismo momento obteniendo algo de ganancia,  Veronica  va a invertir el crédito en la compra de chanchos, así Veronica anhela seguir con su negocio para ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y de ser posible le gustaría comprar una pequeña casita para que sus hijos tengan una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Veronica lives in the countryside, where her source of income is raising animals and agriculture. Veronica is married and has four children, ages 4, 8, 9, and 12, who are in school. Veronica's husband works as a driver. She raises and sells pigs. Sometimes she raises them and sells them, and other times she goes to the markets and buys piglets to sell right away, obtaining some earnings. 

Veronica is going to invest the loan in the purchase of pigs. In this way Veronica wants to continue with her business in order to help her husband with the household expenses, and if possible she would like to buy a little house so that her children can have a better life.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Leonorica

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Leonorica works hard to support her family.

She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines and earns additional income from farming rice. Leonorica is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to  buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Leonorica has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Andres Geovany

texts.es: Andres es un joven de 27 años de edad, tiene un hijo de 7 años que asiste a la escuela, Andres tiene su negocio a medias con su madre ya que dice que mientras que el se va a comprar el ganado para meterlo al camal para faenarlo es su madre quien atiende su negocio que es una tercena, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca para comercializarla en carne  por libras, lo que este joven aspira es mejorar su negocio y sus ventas para seguir trabajando en su local por el que paga arriendo, pero si le va bien,  además comenta que es muy responsable con su hijo y que desea que siga sus estudios.
texts.en:
Andres is a young man of 27. He has a 7-year-old son who goes to school. Andres has a business that he shares with his mother, since he says that while he leaves to buy the livestock to put it in the corral to slaughter it, it is his mother who tends the business, which is a butcher shop.

He is going to invest the loan in the purchase of a cow to sell the meat by the pound. What this young man aspires to is to improve his business and his sales in order to continue working in his shop, for which he pays rent, but it is going well for him. In addition, he comments that he is very responsible with his son and that he wants him to continue his education.

loans.use: to buy a cow to butcher.

loans.name: Kimly

texts.en: A local resident living in Kampot province, Kimly is 37 years old. She is a mother of four children, two of whom are in school and two are too young for school. She grows rice and does wedding decorations as her main sources of income. She can earn about 7 USD per day. This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her loan portion to buy a motorcycle and computer and to pay school fees for her daughter who wants to pursue her Bachelor's degree majoring in Accounting. She hopes that her daughter graduates from the university successfully

loans.use: To buy a motor cycle and a computer and pay school fee for her daughter who wants to pursue a Bachelor's degree majoring in Accounting.

loans.name: Kasangadzi Group

texts.en:
Abigail is 48 years old and she belongs to the Kasangadzi group. She is married to Trasizio and together they have six children who go to school. They also look after school-going orphans. She owns a restaurant selling, nsima, rice, chicken, beef. 

She is requesting this loan to boost her capital whereby she will purchase maize flour and rice in greater quantities to reach more customers in her village. Abigail started her business to be economically empowered and to be able to support her family.

Before she started accessing loans she was a housewife and has been involved in business for many years. Her ambition is to diversify her business by selling second hand clothes and to satisfy her family's basic needs when she makes more profits. 

Abigail believes that the business management training offered by the Microloan Foundation will assist her to achieve what she wants in her life. As a woman, she is able to feed her family three meals a day, and she has managed to send her children to good schools.

loans.use: to buy various goods for the restaurant such as rice and chicken

loans.name: Eriberto Alonso

texts.es:
Eriberto tiene 60 años de edad, no tiene ningún grado de estudio ya que sus padres pensaban que el estudio no servía para nada, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tiene 3 hijos que ya están casados.


Actualmente, Eriberto se dedica a comprar y vender maíz y frijoles, hace esto desde hace 15 años y lo aprendió porque él trabajaba antes en la agricultura, Eriberto sale desde las 5 de mañana a todos los cantones de la ciudad para comprar el maíz y frijoles por quintales y luego los lleva a vender a las comerciales, recorre cerca de unos 50 kilómetros diarios en un camión y un hijo le ayuda en el trabajo.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar maíz y frijoles para seguir adelante con su negocio.

Sus sueños son tener una mejor vivienda y tener otro vehículo para poder dárselo a su hijo, ademas sueña con tener una tienda fuerte de granos básicos.
texts.en:
Eriberto is 60 years old. He didn't go to school, since his parents thought that education wasn't good for anything. He is married, and his wife does the household tasks. He has three children who are already married.

Eriberto now buys and sells corn and beans. He has been doing this for 15 years, and he learned it because in the past he was working in agriculture. Eriberto goes out at 5 in the morning to all the neighborhoods of the city to buy corn and beans by the quintal (approximately 100 lbs), and then he takes them to sell to businesses. He travels about 50 kilometers daily in his truck, and his son helps him with the work.

He needs the loan to buy corn and beans to continue with his business.

His dreams are to have a better house and have another vehicle to be able to give it to his son. In addition, he dreams of having a store that is well stocked with basic grains.

loans.use: to buy corn and beans to continue with his business

loans.name: Calixte

texts.en:
Callixte is 53 years old. He is married with 5 children aged between 8 and 18, and all of them go to school. He has been farming for 13 years. The loan from Kiva will be used to buy more fertilizers. The profits from the business will be used to pay workers.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizers.

loans.name: Tong

texts.en:
Tong is a silk weaver, while her husband is a farmer and raises cows at home. She lives on an island of the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh. She has six children; three sons and three daughters.
Tong had asked for Kiva loan several times. She now is applying for another loan again in order to help capital in her husband’s faring business by seed, fertilizer and pesticides.
Photo: Tong with her loom.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and pesticides for her husband’s farming business.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: maría de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos, ella posee una venta de tortillas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace 15 años,ella esta solicitando un credito para la comprar de maiz por quintales y cal, para continuar con sus ventas y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María is 49 years old. She lives in her own home with her life partner and their three children. She owns a tortilla shop; her business has been located in her home for the past 15 years. She is asking for a loan to buy corn by the kilo and lime (whitewash) in order to continue her sales and to therefore give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy kilos of corn, and lime (whitewash).

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is thirty-two years of age, single with two children living in Kasese Uganda. Juliet is a teacher and has been in this service for ten years. She was inspired to join teaching by her mother who was also a teacher. Juliet has a dream of building a house of her own and educate her children. Juliet is faithful and faced with a challenge of being over worked. Juliet is requesting for money to buy bricks for construction.

loans.use: to buy bricks for construction.

loans.name: Leonsie

texts.en:
Leoncie, aged 52 years, is married with four children aged between 15 and 24 and all of them go to school. She has been farming for 11 years. With the loan from Kiva, she would like to buy more fertilizers for Irish potatoes. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees of children.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizers for Irish potatoes.

loans.name: Jamoliddin

texts.ru: Чамолиддин в течение 3 лет работает в банке начальником службы безопасности. Ему 47 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Чамолиддин живет со своей семьей в городе Душанбе. Его жена швея, а дети учатся. Дочь Чамолиддина - Ширин, является студенткой. Она учится очно на четвертом курсе Таджикского Национального Университета по специальности "Международные отношения". В следующем году она уже окончит университет и получит диплом о высшем образовании. Однако в данный момент Чамолиддин еще не оплатил за этот год обучения из-за нехватки финансов. Ежегодное обучение дочери в ВУЗе стоит 1500 долларов США. Эту сумму Чамолиддин запрашивает в кредит. Он надеется на вашу поддержку, так как он хочет, чтобы его дочь продолжила учебу и получила диплом.
texts.en: Jamoliddin has been working in a bank as head of security in a bank for three years. He is 47 years old. He is married and has two children. Jamoliddin lives with his family in the city of Dushanbe. His wife is a seamstress, and his children are in school. Jamoliddin's daughter, Shirin, studies at the university. She is a daytime student  in her fourth year of studies at the Tajik National University, majoring in International Relations. Next year she will graduate and receive her university diploma. However, at present Jamoliddin still has to pay for this final year of study due to lack of finances. His daughter's annual university tuition is 1,500 USD. Jamoliddin is applying for a loan in this amount. He is hoping for your support as he would like his daughter to continue her studies and obtain her university diploma.

loans.use: to pay his daughter's annual university tuition.

loans.name: Sonia Marixa

texts.es: Sonia de 37 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hija, la clienta tiene una panadería en su lugar de residencia, dicha actividad le permite tener buenos ingresos y tiene más de 5 años de experiencia, con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar todas las necesidades de su hogar, Sonia solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos para panadería como: harina, levadura, azúcar, miel, etc. y comprar dos panaderas y mas moldes asi como los que muestra en la fotografía para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Sonia is 37 years old and lives with her life companion and their daughter. She has a bakery in her home, and this activity allows her to have a good income. 

She has more than five years experience, and with what she earns from her sales, she manages to pay for all of her household needs. 

In order to earn more income, Sonia is requesting a loan in order to buy ingredients for her bakery, such as flour, yeast, sugar, honey, etc. and to buy two baking pans and more moulds, as shown in the photo.

loans.use: To buy flour, yeast, sugar, honey, etc., as well as two baking pans and more moulds.

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en: Alfred is twenty-nine years, old married with two children living in Kasese Uganda. Alfred appreciates the services rendered to him since he was able to improve his income and pay off the loan. He operates a retail shop of general merchandise and has been in that business for thirteen years. He also practices farming as an additional source of income. Alfred has a dream of expanding his business. Alfred wants money to buy salt, sugar, soap and other general merchandise for selling.

loans.use: to buy salt, sugar, soap and other general merchadise for selling

loans.name: Koki

texts.en:
Koki is 51 years old, married and together with her spouse they have been blessed with 5 children. She does farming in Tala town where she grows cash crops for sale and also keeps livestock. She has been in this business for 29 years now and it has been profitable.

She will use the anticipated profits to buy fertilizer, seeds and feeds for her livestock. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children.

This is her first loan term from VisionFund Kenya and her future hopes are to be successful in her farming.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and feeds for her livestock

loans.name: Latifa

texts.en:
Latifa is 31 year old and married with 3 kids. She is an IDP and lives with her family in the Bilasuvar region. 

Latifa's husband works, but his salary is not enough to cover the family's needs. For this reason Latifa grows fruits and vegetables such as tomatoes, cucumber, and potatoes and then sells her crops in the local bazaar.  Her monthly profit from this business is 80 AZN. Now she needs to expand her business by buying new fruit trees, fertilizer and seeds.

Latifa only hopes that Kiva will help her, please support her.

loans.use: to expand her business by buying new fruit trees, fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Emilia Antonia

texts.es:
Las calles de Suchitepéquez es testigo de los colores más vistosos impregnados en las blusas, cortes y fajas típicas.  Es imposible que cualquier turista deje de admirar este producto, pararse y hacer una buena compra de ello, es la actividad que Emilia realiza de 37 años de edad casada que cuenta con cuatro hijos por los cuales está decidido a luchar por la vida y abrir nuevas puertas hacia el futuro, los primeros dos hijos ya tienen familia propias y los dos últimos son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de la comunidad.
	
La actividad que ella desempeña es la elaboración de güipiles, cortes y fajas típicas, ella viene realizando dicha actividad durante 12 años ella ha venido realizando un gran esfuerzo para poder elaborar sus actividades de la mejor calidad y diversos estilos para poder atraer a más clientes para tener un mejor ingreso económico para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El uso respectivo que ella le dará al crédito es para la compra de materia prima como hilos de diferentes colores y otros insumos que se requieren en la elaboración de su actividad para poder tener un ingreso económico. Uno de las grandes aspiraciones de Emilia es ver que sus hijos se convierten en profesionales en los diferentes campos laborales y agrandar más su negocio para así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
The streets of Suchitepéquez are a testament to the most vibrant colors, saturating blouses, skirts, and traditional wraps. It is impossible for any tourist to not admire these products and to stop to make a good purchase. This is the work that Emilia does. She is 37 years old, married, and has four children for whom she has decided to struggle for life and to open new doors to the future. The first two children already have their own families and the last two are excellent students in the community school. 

She carries out the work of making traditional huipiles, skirts, and wraps. She has been doing this work for 12 years. She has been making a great effort to do work of the best quality - and to make diverse styles - in order to attract new clients, have better earnings, and improve her family's living conditions.

She will use the loan to buy raw material, such as different colors of thread and other items that she needs to do this work and to be able to have a source of income. One of Emilia's greatest aspirations is to see that her children become professionals in different career fields and to amplify her business, therefore making better earnings.

loans.use: to buy raw material to make typical clothing.

loans.name: Roggers

texts.en: Roggers is a 34-year-old married man with three children. He lives in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a parish chief for six years and does farming for additional income. He dreams of improving his standard of living. Long distances are a challenge for him because he does community work, Roggers is an honest person and wants money to buy land for his family.

loans.use: to buy land for his family.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 37 years old. He is married with 4 children aged between 5 and 14; 3 of them go to school. He has been farming for 7 years. With the loan for Kiva, he would like to buy more fertilizer for potatoes. The profits from the business will be used on his farming of domestic animals such as cows.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer for his potatoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers, urea (a chemical compound), coffee formula compounds, herbicides, and more to help with her coffee crops.

loans.name: Davlyatkhon

texts.ru: Давлятхон 43-летняя замужняя женщина. Она родом из района Дж.Руми. Давлятхон живет там вместе с сыном, невесткой и дочерью. Ее сын таксист, а невестка помогает Давлятхон в ее деятельности. Вот уже 6 лет как Давлятхон занимается швейным делом. Она шьет только национальные женские платья. Давлятхон сейчас очень нуждается в кредите. Ее старый дом уже несколько лет не видел ремонта и сейчас находится в плохом состоянии. За счет запрашиваемой суммы кредита Давлятхон хочет провести ремонт в доме и создать хорошие условия для житья в нем. Без этого кредита она не может осуществить задуманное и не сможет подготовиться к зиме. Поэтому она надеется только на Вас.
texts.en: Davlyatkhon is 43 years old and married.  She comes from the J.Rumy district of Tajikistan, where she lives with her son, daughter-in-law and their daughter.  Her son works as a taxi driver and her daughter-in-law helps Davlyatkhon with her own sewing business, which she started six years ago.  Davlyatkhon exclusively sews traditional Tajik dresses for women.  At the moment, she really needs a loan.  Her old house hasn't been repaired for several years and it is in bad condition.  Davlyatkhon plans to use the amount of her loan to perform some repairs in her house and to make it more comfortable.  Without this loan, she will not be able to carry out her plan and have her house ready for the winter.  She is relying solely on you.

loans.use: to repair her house and improve her living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her son’s university costs.

loans.name: Oygul

texts.ru:
Ойгуль по профессии медик и работает в этой сфере в течение 20 лет. Она все эти годы занимается лечением больных. У нее высшее медицинское образование и многолетний стаж работы. Ойгуль работает в частной клинике, где предоставляет свои услуги. Вместе с нею в этой клинике работают еще несколько врачей. В данный момент Ойгуль обратилась за кредитом для расширения своей деятельности. Она хочет приобрести современный аппарат-массажер для лечения своих больных. 
Ойгул 66 лет, она живет в районе Носири Хусрав вместе со взрослыми детьми, невестками и внуками.
Данный кредит поможет Ойгуль расширить деятельность и она с надеждой ожидает поддержки.
texts.en:
Oygul is a physician and she has been working in the field of medicine, taking care of the sick, for the past 20 years.  She has a medical degree and a long experience in her field of work.  She provides her services within a private clinic, which she shares with a few other doctors.  She has requested a loan to expand her range of services and to buy some modern massage equipment to treat her patients.

Oygul is 66 years old.  She lives in the Nosiri Khusrav district of Tajikistan with her adult children, daughters-in-law and grandchildren.  This loan will allow her to expand her activity.  She is looking forward to receiving some support.

loans.use: to buy some massage equipment.

loans.name: Rodesa

texts.en: Rodesa is aged 39, married and blessed with two children. She has owned and managed a retail store in their village for almost 13 years and earns a net income of PHP 1,500 daily. Her net income on this business was spent on the school allowances of their children. Due to insufficient funds for her business she would like to borrow a loan amounting to PHP 33,000 to purchase beverages, chips, canned goods, sugar, coffee, powdered juice, and cooking oil to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, chips, canned goods, sugar, coffee, powder juice, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Farzona

texts.ru: Фарзона активная молодая девушка родом из района Вахш. Она в свои 22 года зарабатывает на жизнь и уже 6 лет как предоставляет услуги швеи. Фарзона научилась этой деятельности у матери. Ее мать в данный момент занимается растениеводством, а отец тоже работает. У Фарзоны есть младшая сестра и брат. Сестра учится в школе, а брат студент. Он учится в Таджикском Национальном Университете, в факультете "Финансы и кредит". Родители Фарзоны сейчас не имеют финансовой возможности, чтобы оплатить за учебу сына. Фарзона как сестра хочет помочь брату, чтобы он смог продолжить учебу в ВУЗе. Для этого Фарзона запрашивает кредит в размере 1500 долларов США. Эта сумма пойдет на оплату годового контракта брата и для покупки ему необходимых учебных принадлежностей. Фарзоне и ее семье этот кредит действительно важен.
texts.en: Farzona is a dynamic young woman from Vakhsh.  At the age of 22, she is already making a living, as she has been working as a seamstress for the past six years.  She learned her trade from her mother.  Her mother now works in agriculture and her father is also working.  Farzona has two younger siblings: a sister and a brother.  Her sister is still in school and her brother is a university student.  He is enrolled at the School of Finance and Credit of the Tajik National University.  Farzona's parents are currently not in a position to pay for their son's tuition.  Farzona wants to help her brother and see him pursue his studies.  For this reason, she is taking a loan of 1,500 USD.  She will use this loan to pay for her brother's annual tuition and to buy him the necessary school supplies.  This loan is very important to Farzona and her family.

loans.use: to pay for her brother's university tuition and to buy the school supplies that he needs.

loans.name: Soknoeum

texts.en:
Soknoeum, age 36, lives in a village about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has been married since 2002 and has three children--two sons and one daughter. Two of her children attend school and another one is a monk. Besides her children, her elderly mother and sister are also living with her. 

Soknoeum is a weaver and her husband is a construction worker. She is applying for a loan to purchase a motorbike for her husband for commuting to work because he goes to work by bicycle. Riding a bicycle is tiring and takes time.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for her husband to drive to work.

loans.name: Sumanbar

texts.en: Sumanbar is a hardworking young woman. She is 18 years old. Sumanbar lives with her family in a village far from town. She is the elder daughter in her family. She has helped her parents since childhood to grow vegetables. Sumanbar studied well in school. Now, she is a first-year student. She studies successfully. Sumanbar’s parents do not have the opportunity to pay for her tuition. She is asking for a loan to pay for her university tuition. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Kadzo

texts.en:
Kadzo is a married woman with seven kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Kadzo operates a grocery stall selling vegetables. She sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of high cost of transportation to her place of operation. With the 30,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale.

loans.name: Alvina

texts.en:
Alvina lives with her big family in Ijevan in the Tavush region. She is 35 years old and is a mother of three children. Her elder daughter is a student, her son is 17 years old and is looking for a job, and her youngest daughter is school aged.

Alvina is trained as a nurse but she has never worked in that field. Now she works as a saleswoman in a clothing store. Her husband works at a construction shop; he also does electrical installation work on the side.  Alvina and her husband barely cover all their family's needs, sometimes with great effort and difficulty. 

Among all of their hardships they have a very important situation, which demands financial support. Alvina greatly hopes that she will receive this loan, which she will use for her youngest daughter’s eye treatment. This is a very urgent and significant problem for Alvina to solve.

loans.use: to pay for her youngest daughter’s eye treatment

loans.name: Raul Oswaldo

texts.es: Raul  es un señor que se dedica a al comercio de animales menores como chanchos, cuyes y gallinas en la casa donde viven arrendando, el es casado y tiene un hijo de 20 años de edad que asiste a la universidad, su esposa cría pollos, Raul va a invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de gallinas para revenderlas en el mercado de la ciudad de donde él vive,  Raul desea que  mejore sus negocio y  que su hijo siga estudiando hasta que termine su carrera universitaria.
texts.en: Raul makes a living selling young animals, such as pigs, guinea pigs and hens, from the house that he rents. Raul is married and has a 20-year-old son who is studying at university. Raul's wife raises chicken. Raul is going to invest this loan in more hens to re-sell at the city market. Raul wants to improve his business and wants his son to finish his university studies.

loans.use: to buy hens.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: maría de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 6 años, tiene mucha clientela por los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando un crédito para al compra de mas productos como: sopas, detergentes, golosinas, granos básicos, leche, etc. para surtir mas su negocio y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposo.
texts.en: María is 57 years old and lives with her husband in a house that they own. María has a small shop that she has been running out of her home for six years. She has many customers because of the good prices. María is applying for a loan in order to buy more products, such as soups, detergents, sweets, basic grains, milk and more to stock up her business and to enjoy a higher quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy soups, detergents, sweets, basic grains, milk and more.

loans.name: Meilin Elizabeth

texts.es: Meilin de 29 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su grupo familiar y sus 2 hijos de 11 y 7 años de edad y su hermano de 25 años de edad. Ella es una joven que se esfuerza cada día para darle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia y es por ello que se gana la vida con la venta de tortillas que realiza en su lugar de residencia por lo que se siente muy feliz de contar con su negocio. Meilin desea encementar el piso de su vivienda y cambiar el techo de su vivienda, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, lamina y polines para cambiar el techo de su vivienda y encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en:
Meilin is 29 years old and lives in her own home with her family and her two children, ages 11 and 7, and her 25 year old brother.  She is a young woman who strives every day to provide better living conditions to her family and who earns a living selling tortillas out of her home.  She is happy about having this business.

Meilin wants to install a cement floor in her home and replace the roof, so she is asking for a loan, through FUSAI, to buy cement, sand, gravel, metal, and beams for the roof and floor.

loans.use: to install a floor and fix his roof.

loans.name: Los Sauces Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 7 mujeres  responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “LOS SAUCES” una de ellas es  JULIA   de 38  años  soltera  y sin hijos , julia   se dedica ya hace 7 años a la venta  de comida(desayuno y cena)    en un pequeño  mercado  todos los días con el merito de salir adelante y tener un ingreso mas ,  Con el fruto de su esfuerzo  julia  ha logrado mejorar su  vivienda   y  también  Seguir mejorando en su  negocio, , Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más sillas, mesas menestras etc.  y así  poder ampliar su local y poder tener más ingresos. julia   se encuentra sentada se le distingue por su casaca de color negro, es la segunda de la mano izquierda  , A la vez se despide con un abraso a Kiva y Edaprospo y  agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso
texts.en:
A group of seven responsible women with different businesses are the members of the “LOS SAUCES” community group.  Julia is one of the members.  She is 38 years old and single with no children.  Julia has been selling food (breakfast and dinner) at a small market, every day for the past seven years in order to get ahead and have another income.

Julia has managed to make improvements to her home as a result of her efforts, and also continues to improve her business.  She will use the money from this loan to buy more chairs, tables, food, etc. and be able to expand her shop and be able to increase her income.  Julia is seated and is wearing a black cassock.  She is the second from the right.  She sends a big hug to Kiva and Edaprospo and is grateful for the loan that makes it possible for her to move ahead.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items.

loans.name: Julio Antonio

texts.es: Julio de 23 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 8 meses de edad. Él es un hombre que se esfuerza por sostener la economía familiar por medio de su trabajo como albañil el cual ya tiene mucho tiempo de realizar. Julio es un joven humilde que desea darle lo mejor a su compañera de vida y a su pequeño hijo y es por tal motivo que desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda que se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lamina, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en: Julio is 23 years old and lives in a home of her own with his wife and 8 month old son.  He is a man who strives to support his family financially by working as a mason, which he has been doing for a long time.  Julio is a humble young man who wants to provide the best for his wife and son, so he wants to replace the roof on his house because it’s deteriorated.  He is asking for loan, through FUSAI to buy metal, lumber, and nails for the roof.

loans.use: to fix his roof.

loans.name: Bendiciónde Dios Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario integrado por cuatro socias emprendedoras, lo coordina la señora Ángela quien tiene la edad de 39 años, casada, se dedica  la comercialización de frutas en uno de los barrios de la capital, el crédito lo solicita para diversificar los productos que ofrece, comprando mamón, melón, naranja dulce, sandias, aguacate, níspero, etc., es el segundo crédito que trabaja con los financiamientos de la institución, la cual la ha motivado para seguir realizando los préstamos con el fin de su superación. El resto de los integrantes son las señoras, Lilieth quien tiene la edad de 24 años y comercializa ropa en su comunidad, Sorayda de 32 años, quien se dedica a la comercialización de especies en la capital y Roxana quien tiene le edad de 20 años comerciante de frutas y verduras en las calles de la municipalidad.
texts.en: This group is made up of four enterprising ladies, coordinated by Angela.  She is 39 years old, married, and sells fruit in one of the capital city neighborhoods.  She is asking for this loan to diversify the products she offers.  She will buy papayas, cantaloupe, oranges, watermelon, avocado, loquats, etc.  This will be her second loan through the institution that has motivated her to continue getting loans in order to get ahead.  The rest of the members are Lilieth, 24, who sells clothing in the community; Sorayd, 32, who sells spices in the capital; and Roxana, 20, who sells fruits and vegetables on the city streets.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 42 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for 6 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling ready-to-wear clothes.

Elena is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, which is to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco es una persona muy simpática y siempre tiene una sonrisa para los clientes que visitan su tienda de abarrotes en zona rural del municipio de El Carmen De Viboral.

Gracias a su carisma y buen humor se ha podido ganar el corazón y reconocimiento de las personas del sector que siempre prefieren visitar su tienda para adquirir sus productos.

Todos los días trabaja para darles una buena calidad de vida  a sus 4 hijos por los cuales aspira a darles un excelente futuro.
